# Data Source: okta_entitlement

Get the entitlement belonging to an Okta organization.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "okta_entitlement" "test" {
  id = "<entitlement id>"
}
```

### Nested Schema for `values`
Read-Only:
- `id` (String) The id of an entitlement value.
